short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Companion Extension for the Serenic Aurio Mobile App

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capture doctor-patient conversations effortlessly and turn them into structured medical notes. Submit them directly to your EHR with just one click.

Join healthcare professionals who rely on our extension to streamline their documentation process. Paired with our mobile app, you can record conversations and automatically generate SOAP notes that reflect every detail.
